meanings.sent1: She embusied herself with cleaning the house.
meanings.sent2: The children embusy themselves with coloring books.
meanings.sent3: He embusied the ants by placing sugar cubes in their path.
meanings.sent4: The music embusied her mind, drowning out all other thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The bustling city streets embusy the senses with their constant noise and movement.

meanings.definition: To engage in activity or work.
meanings.sent1: They embusy themselves in the garden every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The team embusies themselves in preparing for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat embusies itself by chasing shadows on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her mind embusied itself with thoughts of the upcoming presentation.
meanings.sent5: The bees embusy themselves collecting nectar from the flowers to make honey.
